related_post.text: For uuid is `uuid.uuid4()` safe that ensure no two processes can obtain the same UUID?

so_post.text: @EndenDragon you shouldn't have collision issues with `uuid4` but theres some info here: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/53096198/preventuuidcollisioninpythonsameprocess

comments: Jamya asks question and Sanson provides So answer
